TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridBoolColumn extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle

summary.span: 指定一列，该列中每个单元格均包含一个表示布尔值的复选框。

span.span: Specifies a column in which each cell contains a check box for representing a Boolean value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自`abstract`类。The derives from the `abstract` class . 在运行时，包含每个单元格中的复选框，默认情况下有三种状态： 检查 (`true`)、 未选中状态 (`false`)，和。At run time, the contains check boxes in each cell that have three states by default: checked (`true`), unchecked (`false`), and . 若要使用两个状态的复选框，将属性设置为`false`。To use two-state check boxes, set the property to `false`. 添加到类属性包括， ，和。Properties added to the class include , , and . 这些属性指定基础每一列的状态的值。These properties specify the value underlying each of the column's states. ## Examples 下面的代码示例首先创建一个新并将其添加到的。The following code example first creates a new and adds it to the of a . [!code-cpp[DataGridBoolColumn overview#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridBoolColumn overview/CPP/boolcolumn.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DataGridBoolColumn overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridBoolColumn overview/CS/boolcolumn.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataGridBoolColumn overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridBoolColumn overview/VB/boolcolumn.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取单元格的最佳宽度和高度，此单元格包含特定值。

span.span: Gets the optimum width and height of a cell given a specific value to contain.

returns.span: 一个包含单元格绘制信息的 。

span.span: A that contains the drawing information for the cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法，可调整大小基于显示的值的列。The method allows you to resize the column based on the value displayed. 例如，如果单元格包含一个特别大的值，则可以使用方法返回的单元格的最佳大小基于值。For example, if a cell contains an especially large value, you can use the method to return the optimum size of the cell based on the value. 最佳大小将考虑在内的字符串，但还用来显示它的字体大小。The optimum size takes into account not only the size of the string, but also the font used to display it.
